scripts.mints:keys: solana-keygen new -o dist/keys/mint1.so --no-bip39-passphrase --force; solana-keygen new -o dist/keys/mint2.so --no-bip39-passphrase --force;
scripts.program:redeploy: npm run program:build && npm run program:deploy
scripts.client:prepare: rm -rf dist/keys && npm run mints:keys && npm run user:keys && npm run start -- --user:airdrop && npm run start -- --mints:create && npm run start -- --tokens:create
scripts.client:run-all: npm run start -- --ix=0 && npm run start -- --ix=1 && npm run start -- --ix=3 && npm run start -- --ix=4 && npm run start -- --ix=2
scripts.a: npm run client:prepare && npm run start -- --ix=0 && npm run start -- --ix=1
scripts.b: npm run start -- --ix=4 && npm run start -- --ix=2 && npm run start -- --tokens:clear
scripts.client:cycle: npm run client:prepare && npm run client:run-all && npm run start -- --tokens:clear
scripts.booth:cycle: rm -rf dist/program && npm run program:redeploy && npm run client:cycle
